question:
[02002][고][2017][1-1-b][경기의정부시][영석고]-1 
*경로:2015개정~07. 일차,이차부등식

*유형분류:

*문제:부등식 \\(\\displaystyle \\left | x-a \\right | \\leq 3 \\)의 해가 \\(\\displaystyle -1 \\leq x \\leq 5 \\)일 때, 실수 \\(\\displaystyle a \\)의 값은? 
[\\(\\displaystyle 4 \\)점]

① \\(\\displaystyle 1 \\)		

② \\(\\displaystyle 2 \\)		

③ \\(\\displaystyle 3 \\)

④ \\(\\displaystyle 4 \\)		

⑤ \\(\\displaystyle 5 \\)






















*해설: [정답] ②
\\(\\displaystyle -3 \\leq x-a \\leq 3 \\)
\\(\\displaystyle a-3 \\leq x \\leq a+3 \\)
\\(\\displaystyle a-3=-1 \\)
\\(\\displaystyle a+3=5 \\) 에서 \\(\\displaystyle a=2 \\)

*난이도:2

*동영상링크:

*정답: 2

*힌트:
solution:

*해설: [정답] ②

\\(\\displaystyle a+3=5 \\) 에서 \\(\\displaystyle a=2 \\)

title: [02002][고][2017][1-1-b][경기의정부시][영석고]-1
question:
부등식 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle left | x-a \\[\\displaystyle \\])right | \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle leq 3 \\[\\displaystyle \\]))의 해가 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle -1 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle leq x \\[\\displaystyle \\])leq 5 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )일 때, 실수 \\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle a \\[\\displaystyle \\]))의 값은? 
[\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle 4 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )점]

① \\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle 1 \\[\\displaystyle \\]))		

② \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle 2 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )		

③ \\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle 3 \\[\\displaystyle \\]))

④ \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle 4 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )		

⑤ \\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle 5 \\[\\displaystyle \\]))
solution:
[정답] ②
\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle -3 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle leq x-a \\[\\displaystyle \\])leq 3 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )
\\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle a-3 \\[\\displaystyle \\])leq x \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle leq a+3 \\[\\displaystyle \\]))
\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle a-3=-1 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle )
\\[\\displaystyle \\])(\\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle displaystyle a+3=5 \\[\\displaystyle \\])) 에서 \\[\\displaystyle \\]\\displaystyle (\\[\\displaystyle \\])displaystyle a=2 \\[\\displaystyle \\]

title: [03001][고][2024][1-1][서울강남구][역삼고]-1
question: 함수 \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle ( f(x) = \\(\\displaystyle \\))frac{x^2 - 1}{x - 1} \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle )의 극한 \\(\\displaystyle \\))( \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle lim_{x \\(\\displaystyle \\))to 1} f(x) \\(\\displaystyle \\)을 구하시오.
solution:
함수 \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle ( f(x) = \\(\\displaystyle \\))frac{x^2 - 1}{x - 1} \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle )는 \\(\\displaystyle \\))( x \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle neq 1 \\(\\displaystyle \\)))일 때,
\\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle [
f(x) = \\(\\displaystyle \\))frac{(x - 1)(x + 1)}{x - 1} = x + 1
\\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle ]
따라서, \\(\\displaystyle \\))( \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle lim_{x \\(\\displaystyle \\))to 1} f(x) = \\(\\displaystyle \\)\\displaystyle lim_{x \\(\\displaystyle \\))to 1} (x + 1) = 2 \\(\\displaystyle \\)

title: [03001][고][2024][1-1][서울강남구][역삼고]-1
question:
부등식 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle left | x-a \\$right | $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle leq 3 \\$)의 해가 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle -1 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle leq x \\$leq 5 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )일 때, 실수 \\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle a \\$)의 값은? 
[$\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle 4 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )점]

① \\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle 1 \\$)		

② $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle 2 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )		

③ \\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle 3 \\$)

④ $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle 4 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )		

⑤ \\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle 5 \\$)
solution:
[정답] ②
$\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle -3 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle leq x-a \\$leq 3 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )
\\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle a-3 \\$leq x $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle leq a+3 \\$)
$\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle a-3=-1 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle )
\\$($\\displaystyle \\displaystyle displaystyle a+3=5 \\$) 에서 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle (\\$displaystyle a=2 $\\displaystyle \\displaystyle $

title: [03001][고][2024][1-1][서울강남구][역삼고]-1
question:
부등식 \(\displaystyle \left | x-a \right | \leq 3 \)의 해가 \(\displaystyle -1 \leq x \leq 5 \)일 때, 실수 \(\displaystyle a \)의 값은? 
[\(\displaystyle 4 \)점]

① \(\displaystyle 1 \)		

② \(\displaystyle 2 \)		

③ \(\displaystyle 3 \)

④ \(\displaystyle 4 \)		

⑤ \(\displaystyle 5 \)
solution:
[정답] ②
\(\displaystyle -3 \leq x-a \leq 3 \)
\(\displaystyle a-3 \leq x \leq a+3 \)
\(\displaystyle a-3=-1 \)
\(\displaystyle a+3=5 \) 에서 \(\displaystyle a=2 \)
